structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.catch_line: Prohibited services by licensed athletic trainers -- Responsibilities and duties of licensed athletic trainers -- Prohibited billing.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 30, sec. 3, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 248, sec. 3, effective July 12, 2006.
